title: Cacao mint green smoothie
ingredients: ['120ml cold coconut milk', '30g fresh spinach leaves', '10 leaves fresh mint, chopped', '60g raw cacao nibs or 2 tablespoons cacao powder', '1 teaspoon peppermint extract', 'pinch of stevia powder, or to taste', '1 frozen banana, sliced into chunks', 'ice, or as needed', 'water, or as needed']
